CHAT.comment: INV uncovers computer box
child and mom move over to computer box.
mom experimenting with sensors on computer box.
mom looks behind computer box.
child leans over to look behind box.
computer box flashes and makes noise.
child pushes on top of box and it flashes and makes noise.
mom pushes on top of box and box flashes but does not make noise.
child looks around the room.
child says a made up word.
mom repeats made up word.
mom touches middle button and child touches top button.
child peers into top hole.
mom motions her hand over the front and top of computer box.
child waves his hand over front of box and it lights up.
INV covers computer box
INV uncovers fish tank
mom and child move over to tank.
mom points to starfish at back of tank.
mom makes crawling motion with fingers.
child starts to say something but mom interrupts.
child and mom move to left side of tank.
child laughs.
child gives mom a hug.
child moves his arms quickly to imitate starfish as he walks away.
INV covers up fish tank.
INV brings toy car into room
mom takes car from child and tries to open hood.
child holds car at edge of table.
child drops car onto the floor.
child tries to balance car on edge of table.
child points to back of car.
child lets go of the car and it falls.
child drops car onto floor.
child makes noises as he brings car back up and flies it around room.
child makes noises and brings car over to ledge in front of mirror.
child makes more noises and drives the car around the room.
mom points to arm of couch where child is driving car.
child drops car to floor and then moves it over to table.
child drops car to floor again.
child makes noises as he drops car again.
child imitates mom's laugh.
child drops car onto floor.
child makes noises and brings car back up to the table.
child gives INV the car
child points to fish tank and then to computer box.
INV enters room with Robodog.
INV leaves room.
mom and child move to floor to play with robodog.
mom claps at robodog and he walks towards her.
mom laughs and child moves around and claps his hands.
mom talks to robodog.
child claps and robodog turns its head towards him.
mom and child laugh.
child claps but robodog doesn't react.
child talks to robodog.
child gets closer to robodog and claps.
robodog stops moving.
child gets really close to robodog's head.
child talks to robodog.
robodog moves its head and starts to walk and mom and child laugh.
child starts to say something, but mom interrupts.
child laughs.
child laughs and moves over to pet robodog.
robodog nods head and then mom nods head.
child starts to say something but mom interrupts and starts talking to robodog.
mom touches robodog's nose but nothing happens.
robodog opens its mouth after child touches its nose and mom and child laugh.
child touches robodog's nose again and it shakes its head and it and child laughs.
child picks up robodog two times and moves him around.
mom laughs.
child talkes to robodog.
child claps repeatedly but robodog doesn't respond.
child talks to robodog.
child talks to robodog.
child laughs and runs to middle of room.
child talks to robodog.
child goes over to robodog two times, but it is out of the camera's view.
child goes over to robodog again, but it is out of view.
robodog does something and child laughs.
mom and child speak at the same time.
mom and child clap at robodog.
INV enters the room.
INV takes robodog from room.
INV puts meerkat on table
INV leaves room.
child goes over to grab meerkat.
mom sings and makes meerkat dance.
child blows in meerkat's face.
mom throws meerkat above her head.
child gets up and waves his arms above his head.
child blows in meerkat's face and mom throws it up again.
child blows again and mom throws meerkat up.
child starts talking in deep voice.
child blows air.
child takes meerkat and goes to place it on fish tank.
child places meerkat on table, blows air and then knocks it onto the floor.
child flies meerkat around and makes noises.
child drops meerkat on floor.
child brings meerkat over to mirror.
child drops meerkat on floor.
child looks at meerkat's feet.
child puts meerkat on mom's hair.
mom pulls meerkat off head.
mom blows air and moves meerkat towards child and child laughs.
child blows a big puff of air.
child goes to blow air at meerkat and mom makes meerkat give child a kiss.
child blows air and gives meerkat a kiss. Child laughs and wipes his mouth.
child talks to meerkat.
child blow big puff of air.
child grabs meerkat from mom and raises it above his head.
child drops meerkat onto floor and laughs.
child hits his face with meerkat and then throws it across the room.
child throws meerkat towards mirror.
child throws meerkat across table.
child throws meerkat at mom.
mom cocks arm back and throws meerkat at child and they both laugh.
child throws meerkat at chairs.
mom moves one of the chairs out from under the table and child throws meerkat through space between table and chairs.
mom motions to space under chair.
INV enters room.
INV takes meerkat from room.
INV brings degu into room
mom and child sit at opposite ends of table.
child moves close to cage.
mom talks to degu.
mom and child tap on cage.
mom moves to other side of cage and starts making kissing noises and taps on the cage.
child laughs and degu moves around in cage.
mom talks to degu.
mom moves cage closer to child and he looks down at degu.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child makes funny faces.
child moves shakes arms around and makes a face.
child makes noises and moves around and degu stands on its hind legs.
child stands up to see through top of cage and talks to degu.
mom talks to degu.
mom and child talk to degu.
mom and child tap on cage and child makes noises and then talks to degu.
child points towards tube.
mom and child talk to degu.
INV takes degu from room.
